contact.title: Contact us
contact.hook:
Interesting by Design are interested in your thoughts! So contact us now!

Giving your opinions about our work help us improve in many ways!
Or maybe you just want to get in touch with us.
Well, either way we are eager to hear from you!
Share your mind !
contact.name: Name
contact.whatabout: What are you contacting us about?

notfound.name: News not found
notfound.content: The news you requested does not appear to exist. We invite you to browse our other news or take a look at our latest experiment or to contact us about this.
